verses.roman:
prabhura atipriya dāsa bhagavān paṇḍita
yāṅra dehe kṛṣṇa pūrve hailā adhiṣṭhita

synonyms: prabhura—of the Lord; atipriya—very dear; dāsa—servant; bhagavān paṇḍita—of the name Bhagavān Paṇḍita; yāṅra—whose; dehe—in the body; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; pūrve—previously; hailā—became; adhiṣṭhita—established.
translation: The thirtieth branch was Bhagavān Paṇḍita. He was an extremely dear servant of the Lord, but even previously he was a great devotee of Lord Kṛṣṇa who always kept the Lord within his heart.
